name: Melon Rush
description:
Melon Rush is a co-op platformer for 1-4 melon-lovers 🍉.

PUSH THE MELONS; KICK THE MELONS; THROW THE MELONS!

Grow and deliver as many melons as possible before the time runs out! Cooperate with your friends to improve your score! Randomly generated levels make for infinite™ replayability!

Melon Rush was created for the Melon Game Jam!

Includes keyboard- and gamepad controls.

Gamepad buttons are mapped along the Dualshock 4 Controller, other gamepads are supported too, but the button-mapping may differ.
